Package me.agno.gridjavacore.server

Class GridServer<T>

java.lang.Object
me.agno.gridjavacore.server.GridServer<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGridServer<T>
public class GridServer<T> extends Object implements IGridServer<T>
The GridServer class represents a server-side component that provides functionality for working with grids.

    getGrid

  • Constructor Details

    • GridServer

      public GridServer()
      This class represents a GridServer object. GridServer is used to configure and fetch data for a grid.

    • GridServer

      public GridServer(jakarta.persistence.EntityManager entityManager, Class<T> targetType, Map<String,String[]> query, Consumer<IGridColumnCollection<T>> columns)
      Initializes a GridServer object.
      Parameters:
      entityManager - the entity manager used to execute queries
      targetType - the class representing the target type of the grid data
      query - the query parameters for filtering, sorting, and searching the grid data
      columns - a consumer function used to configure the grid columns

    • GridServer

      public GridServer(jakarta.persistence.EntityManager entityManager, Class<T> targetType, Map<String,String[]> query, Consumer<IGridColumnCollection<T>> columns, int pageSize)
      Represents a GridServer object. GridServer is used to configure and fetch data for a grid.
      Parameters:
      entityManager - the entity manager used to execute queries
      targetType - the class representing the target type of the grid data
      query - the query parameters for filtering, sorting, and searching the grid data
      columns - a consumer function used to configure the grid columns
      pageSize - the number of items to display per page

    • GridServer

      public GridServer(jakarta.persistence.EntityManager entityManager, Class<T> targetType, Map<String,String[]> query, Consumer<IGridColumnCollection<T>> columns, int pageSize, IColumnBuilder<T> columnBuilder)
      Represents a GridServer object. GridServer is used to configure and fetch data for a grid.
      Parameters:
      entityManager - the entity manager used to execute queries
      targetType - the class representing the target type of the grid data
      query - the query parameters for filtering, sorting, and searching the grid data
      columns - a consumer function used to configure the grid columns
      pageSize - the number of items to display per page
      columnBuilder - an object that creates grid columns based on grid annotations.

    • searchable

      public IGridServer<T> searchable(boolean enable, boolean onlyTextColumns)
      Enables or disables the searchable functionality for the grid with the specified parameters. By default, the searchable functionality is enabled.
      Specified by:
      searchable in interface IGridServer<T>
      Parameters:
      enable - true to enable searching, false to disable searching
      onlyTextColumns - true to enable searching only in text columns, false to enable searching in all columns
      Returns:
      an instance of the IGridServer object with the searchable functionality enabled or disabled

    • searchable

      public IGridServer<T> searchable(boolean enable, boolean onlyTextColumns, boolean hiddenColumns)
      Enables or disables the searchable functionality for the grid with the specified parameters.
      Specified by:
      searchable in interface IGridServer<T>
      Parameters:
      enable - true to enable searching, false to disable searching
      onlyTextColumns - true to enable searching only in text columns, false to enable searching in all columns
      hiddenColumns - true to include hidden columns in the search, false to exclude hidden columns from the search
      Returns:
      an instance of the IGridServer object with the searchable functionality enabled or disabled
